summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text: Sanderson is a census-designated place  in and the county seat of Terrell County, Texas, United States. The population was 837 at the 2010 census. Sanderson was created in 1882 as a part of neighboring Pecos County. It became the seat of Terrell County in 1905.
title: Sanderson, Texas
